reason: User reported runtime error: ArgumentValidationError with sortBy parameter. Convex dev hasn't regenerated API types after adding sortBy to getBacklinks args in convex/backlinks.ts. Fix: removed sortBy from query call temporarily.
thinking_process: Fixed by removing sortBy parameter from useQuery call in page.tsx:120-124. Backlinks will display with default sorting until Convex regenerates API types. Committed as 093fbe6.

how_to_test.name: Verify Backlinks tab loads without validation errors
Verify backlinks table displays data correctly
